This protocol has been performed using human embryonic stem cells \(hESCs), neonatal rat ventricular myocytes \(NRVMs), and KMBC cholangiocarcinoma cells.

Plate cells at a concentration of 1 million cells / mL.
  2. 24 hours after plating,
Switch to serum-free or EV-cleared media.
Collect supernatant after 24 hr \(hESCs) or 48 hr \(NRVMs or KMBCs).
4. Centrifuge at 500 x g for 10 min.
Transfer supernatant to a fresh tube and

Centrifuge at 2,000 x g for 10 min. 
  6.
